Name: Computer Emulator
Description: A computer emulator is a system, usually implemented in software, that is designed to simulate the behavior of a computer.

Properties.Name: Emulated Computer
Properties.Description: The computer system this emulator imitates.

Properties.Name: Emulated Peripheral Classes
Properties.Description: Any peripheral classes this emulator imitates

Properties.Name: Emulated Peripherals
Properties.Description: Any specific peripherals this emulator imitates
